slide2.title: We uncover every hidden hardware issue
slide2.text: With state-of-the-art benches we check liquid damage, data lines and micro electronics before the damage escalates.

slide3.title: Tech support that fits your daily routine
slide3.text: From business devices to family tablets: we consult in person, collect your gear and return it ready for use.

header.title: Welcome to Skylad â€“ your tech workshop in Nuremberg

intro.title: More than display repairs
intro.text1: For over a decade our certified team has taken care of smartphones, tablets, laptops and wearables from all leading brands.
intro.text2: Working in ESD-protected labs we document each step digitally and keep you informed about the current status at all times.
intro.text3: From cracked glass to board level repairs â€“ including spare part sourcing, data recovery and our in-house device loan service.
